title: Severe Server Lag
body: Not entirely sure what's up with the servers today but everyone in my games today has been experiencing ping spikes from 300+ some saying they were getting 4000+ ping!

replies.body: i get inconsistent and unstable ping(200-800 keep jumping) ... it just keep going up and the suddenly down by a bit. My FPS is also very unstable now especially after patch 5.9. It is definitely riot server's problem because i use to get 80 constant ping and 200 constant ping at worst.  Btw are you using LAN or WIFI ? Wifi tends to be a little less stable in ping.
how about playing the game when it is midnight ? I get pretty good ping when it is midnight either because no one is using the internet or server is not so busy when it is midnight.
Veto to sever severe server lag.
it's worse today people are getting the "firewall" issue

Same here. People getting disconnected and getting the "Attempting to Reconnect", chatted with others even on the enemy team. I usually get that 600 stable ping after 1 game. I hope Riot gives us an update on this issue.
